title: Apple May Lose Its Epic Trial
itunes:title: Apple May Lose Its Epic Trial
description:
Antitrust law expert Harry First, a professor at New York University Law School, and Malathi Nayak, Bloomberg Legal Reporter, discuss the high stakes Apple-Epic trial.

June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
